title: Mini Notepad - The Simple & Fast Online Notepad
metaDescription: Your free, fast, and simple online notepad. Write, save, and share notes seamlessly. Supports dark mode and offline use. No ads, just pure focus.
customUrlHelp: Only letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores allowed
noNotesYet: No notes yet, click the button above to create your first note
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
shareSuccessMessage: Anyone can view your note through this link
heroSubtitle: A simple, fast, and secure notepad online. Write, save, and share your notes effortlessly. Now with dark mode and offline support. No ads, just your thoughts.
featureFree: A completely free notepad with no ads to distract you.
featureFast: A quick and simple notes app designed for speed.
featureDarkMode: A notepad with dark mode for comfortable writing at night.
featureOffline: Your offline notepad that works even without internet.
